__e: Believe me, Lester, you don't want to go to jail.
OK Uh,lester,could you excuse me for a second?
Mr. Lester, did you know that your wife was having an affair?
I don't know where you are, mate... ..but you're going to have to get in touch with us.
If so, why isn't Lester's wife dead?
You didn't think Lester was going to let you have it all your own way?
You give me Lester, and we'll let you thumb a ride with us.
Listen, I know it's not my case, but I'd like your permission to go back to Lester's house and see what he has to say.
So if she dies and Bill dies and I die, then you get Lester and Aaron.
He's sure Jack Lester is the man he wants.
He's a very nice boy, but I don't want him seeing me like that.
Well, thank you, Mr Lester, that's all we need to know.
